sentences.sContent: We drank tea by lamplight in his sparsely furnished house.
sentences.sCn: 我们在他这间没什么家具的房子里，我们在灯下喝茶。

phrases.pCn: （房间）布置得好；（家俱）陈设得当的

remMethod.val: fur(皮毛) ＋ nish → 用皮毛提供装备 → 提供

trans.tranOther: A furnished room or house is available to be rented together with the furniture in it
